name: The Hidden Labyrinth
description:
The Hidden Labyrinth is a 2 player Survival Game where the aim of the game is to trust one another to escape the maze. 

Controls For Player in the Maze

WASD - Move

Mouse - Look

Left Shift - Sprint

Controls For Player in the Sky

WASD - Move

Left Control - Go Down

Space - Go Up

Left Shift - Speed Up
